document.full_text: disruption to amazon.com inc servers that host internet services took down a raft of social networking websites including foursquare and quora early on thursday, underscoring concerns about reliability as more companies turn to the "cloud."
document.title: amazon cloud disruption hits some startups
lines_and_colors: disruption to amazon.com inc servers that host internet services took down a raft of social networking websites including foursquare and quora early on thursday, underscoring concerns about reliability as more companies turn to the "cloud."
